name: Muzzleloaded
description: Shipwrecked and alone, you find a mysterious cave full of secrets and danger. With your new muzzleloader, battle sea creatures and challenging bosses while discovering upgrades in this 2D adventure!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: XP 处理器: Core 2 Duo 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: Discreet video card 存储空间: 需要 400 MB 可用空间 声卡: Yes
